source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_00<tab>Minfilia is waiting to hear whether or not you will pledge your support to the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_00<tab>「暁の血盟」のミンフィリアは、冒険者の協力を待ち望んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_01<tab>Taken by an inexplicable urge to wax lyrical, you decide to signify your commitment to the cause by incorporating the order's password, “wild rose,” into a line of improvised verse. Betraying no embarrassment, Minfilia accepts your whimsical utterance in the spirit it was intended, and welcomes you to the Scions. She then introduces you to its leading members: the scholars of Sharlayan, some of whom are familiar to you. Without further ado, you are assigned your first task─to investigate a series of crimes committed in Ul'dah, which the Scions suspect to be primal-related. Speak with Thancred, the debonair bard, to learn the details of your mission.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_01<tab>ミンフィリアに合言葉を伝え、「暁の血盟」への協力を了承した。「暁の血盟」は、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>やミンフィリアのような能力者と、エオルゼアを守るために活動する賢者たちから構成されているらしい。<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、賢者たちのひとり「サンクレッド」とともに、ある2つの事件を調査するようミンフィリアから頼まれた。まずは「サンクレッド」と話をしてみよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_02<tab>Thancred believes that the caravan robbery and the recent spate of disappearances are connected. He suggests that you begin your investigation by visiting the scene of the suspected abductions. Make your way to Camp Drybone in eastern Thanalan, and seek the cooperation of a man named Isembard.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_02<tab>いずれも犯人はアマルジャ族と推測される「クリスタル強奪事件」と「貧民誘拐事件」。サンクレッドの推測では、2つの事件の根は同じところにあるのだという。貧民誘拐事件は、特にキャンプ・ドライボーンで多発しているらしい。キャンプ・ドライボーンの「イセムバード」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_03<tab>Arriving at Camp Drybone, you speak with Isembard, who offers you his full cooperation in the investigation.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_03<tab>イセムバードは、冒険者たちに協力してくれるらしい。さっそく彼から話を聞いて、近辺の調査に乗り出そう。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_04<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_05<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_06<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_10<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_11<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Thancred.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Isembard at Camp Drybone.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_01<tab>キャンプ・ドライボーンのイセムバードと話す

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_02<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_03<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_1<tab>We Scions have but one objective: to safeguard the future of Eorzea. Among our gravest concerns are the godlike beings known as the primals. Long have we striven to find a lasting solution to the threat they pose.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_1「暁の血盟」は、エオルゼア救済のため
蛮神問題に取り組んでいるの。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_2<tab>I know not what it is you desire for yourself, nor what it was that first brought you to Eorzea, but I firmly believe that the power we possess was given to us for a purpose. Pray consider this when you give me your answer, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_2平坦な道ではないけれど、あなたにも利があるはず。
いい返事を期待しているわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_Q1_000_1<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_Q1_000_1<tab>ミンフィリアに合言葉を告げる？

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_A1_000_1<tab>I will go whither the <var 1A 02 /var>wild rose<var 1A 01 /var> blooms.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_A1_000_2<tab>Yours is no small endeavor...
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_A1_000_3<tab>The dangers are great...
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_A1_000_4<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_3<tab>Small? No. Worthy? Undeniably. We labor for the good of all the realm.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_3ええ、わたしたちの活動には勇気がいるわ。
その心意気、とってもいいわね。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_4<tab>They are. Yet the risks we take are justified, given that which is at stake.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_MINFILIA_000_4そ、そう……。
あなたにも、いろいろあったのね……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000010_MINFILIA<tab>I take it you will help us.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000010_MINFILIAフフ、さっそく使っているわね。
協力してくれると受け取っていいのかしら？

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000020_MINFILIA<tab>Wonderful! I knew you wouldn't let us down!
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000020_MINFILIAよかった、ありがとう！
きっと協力してくれると思っていたの！

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000030_MINFILIA<tab>Forgive me for treating you as a stranger. I know you deserve better than this, considering all you've done for the realm.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000030_MINFILIAごめんなさい……。
エオルゼアのために戦ってくれたあなたを、
こんな扱いにするなんて……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000040_MINFILIA<tab>It remains unclear why no one remembers you. We can only assume that it is a consequence of the power that Louisoix invoked to save your life.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000040_MINFILIAなぜ、みんなの記憶がないのか、理由は定かではないの。
賢者ルイゾワが呼び出した、
「十二神」の力の影響なのかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000050_MINFILIA<tab>But irrespective of the cause, know that whatever shroud has fallen upon people's memories, there will surely be a way to lift it.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000050_MINFILIAでも、きっと何かきっかけがあれば、
みんな、あなたを思い出すはず。
……本来は、あるべき記憶なんだもの……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000060_MINFILIA<tab>Thank you for understanding.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000070_MINFILIA<tab>But come, I would introduce you to your friends in the order.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000070_MINFILIA<tab>では、改めて「暁の血盟」の仲間たちを紹介しなきゃ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000080_MINFILIA<tab>Tell me, does the name Sharlayan ring any bells?
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000080_MINFILIA<tab>シャーレアン……という言葉に、聞き覚えはあるかしら？

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000090_MINFILIA<tab>It used to be one of Eorzea's six city<var 1F /var>states, and was situated in the northwest of Aldenard.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000090_MINFILIAエオルゼア六大都市の1つで、
アルデナード小大陸の北西にある都市国家よ。
いえ、正確には「あった」というべきかしらね。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000100_MINFILIA<tab>The Sharlayans were the keepers of wisdom both old and new. Their mastery over magic and aether was unsurpassed, and even the Garleans knew to fear them.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000100_MINFILIA彼らは、古の知に精通し、エーテル学や魔法の分野では
帝国さえ凌駕する知識と技術をもっていたの。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000110_MINFILIA<tab>Among their number, there were a noble few who devoted their lives to safeguarding the future of Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000110_MINFILIAそんなシャーレアンの中で、
賢人と呼ばれる人々が結成したのが、救世詩盟。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000120_MINFILIA<tab>When the realm began its descent into chaos, and their countrymen fled for the motherland, they alone chose to remain here. These noble men and women were called the Archons.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000120_MINFILIAエオルゼアが、滅亡から逃れる希望があると信じて、
この地に残って活動してくれた集団よ。
ほかの住民は、北洋の本国に帰ってしまったけどね。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000130_MINFILIA<tab>Those same brave souls stand before you now.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000130_MINFILIA<tab>彼らが、そのシャーレアンの賢人たち。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000140_MINFILIA<tab>The masked woman is Yda, and beside her is Papalymo. The two are charged with surveying the Twelveswood.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000140_MINFILIA彼女がイダ。
隣が、パパリモよ。
2人とも、森の都グリダニアの調査を担当しているわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000150_YDA<tab>Hello there!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000160_PAPALYMO<tab>Well come!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000170_PAPALYMO<tab>I had every confidence that you would agree to help us.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000170_PAPALYMO<tab>君なら協力してくれると信じていたよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000180_YDA<tab>Me too!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000190_YDA<tab>Okay, my turn to introduce someone! That there is Thancred!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000200_PAPALYMO<tab>He is our man here in Ul'dah, jewel of the desert.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000200_PAPALYMO<tab>ここ、砂の都ウルダハの調査の担当者だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000210_THANCRED<tab>Welcome to the team!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000220_THANCRED<tab>I never doubted that you'd come!
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000220_THANCRED<tab>協力してくれると信じてたぜ！

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000230_THANCRED<tab>If I may, the lovely maiden beside me is named Y'shtola. Limsa Lominsa has the pleasure of being under her care.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000230_THANCRED彼女は、ヤ・シュトラだ。
海の都リムサ・ロミンサの調査の担当をしている。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000240_YSHTOLA<tab>Greetings.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>I have been expecting you.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>Last but not least is Urianger, who presides over all affairs within these halls. Pray seek him out whenever you have questions.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000260_YSHTOLA最後に、彼はウリエンジェ・オギュレ。
この本部の執務長よ。
困ったことがあったら、彼に聞くといいわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000270_URIANGER<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Dawn may banish even the darkest night...<var 1A 01 /var>
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000270_URIANGER<tab>月明輝けども　必ずや暁迎えん……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000280_URIANGER<tab>...The words of a dear friend. I am glad of our meeting.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000280_URIANGERわが友の言葉……。
この出会いに感謝を。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>At the Battle of Carteneau, our leader was taken from us. But we did not stray from our purpose.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000290_YSHTOLA我々は、5年前の「カルテノーの戦い」で痛手を負い、
指導者を失った……。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>We sought out Minfilia and others with her talent, and together established the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000300_YSHTOLAそして、我々と歩みを共にしていたミンフィリアたちと、
「暁の血盟」を結成したの。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000310_MINFILIA<tab>Along with the Archons, those blessed with the Echo play a pivotal role in our endeavor to forge a brighter tomorrow for the realm.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000310_MINFILIA……このように、能力者とシャーレアンの賢人を中心に、
「暁の血盟」は多くの盟員で構成されているわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000320_MINFILIA<tab>Oh, I should also introduce you to Tataru, our clerk. She ensures that everything runs smoothly.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000320_MINFILIAそして彼女……。
受付や事務処理を担当している、タタルさんよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000330_TATARU<tab>Pleased to make your acquaintance!
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000340_MINFILIA<tab>In time, I hope you will come to think of us as family.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000340_MINFILIA<tab>みんなで、仲良くやっていきましょう！

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000350_MINFILIA<tab>But without further ado...
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000360_MINFILIA<tab>I would assign you your first task.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000370_MINFILIA<tab>Urianger. Have the documents arrived from the Students of Baldesion?
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000370_MINFILIAウリエンジェさん。
バルデシオン委員会からの資料は届いてる？

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000380_URIANGER<tab>Aye, my lady, they arrived but recently.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000390_MINFILIA<tab>We have received a request for aid from the Immortal Flames.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000390_MINFILIAウルダハのグランドカンパニー「不滅隊」から、
ある事件への協力要請があったの。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000400_MINFILIA<tab>Thancred, would you do the honors?
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000400_MINFILIAサンクレッド。
説明をお願いできるかしら。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000410_THANCRED<tab>It would be my pleasure.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000420_THANCRED<tab>Some days ago, a crystal caravan registered to Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern was waylaid and divested of its cargo.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000420_THANCREDナナワ銀山で採掘されたクリスタルを運ぶ
アマジナ鉱山社系のキャラバンが襲撃された。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000430_THANCRED<tab>But there is more. Within a bell of the robbery, several people were reported missing from the shantytown outside the city.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000430_THANCREDそれだけじゃない。
時を同じくして、ウルダハ近辺の貧民窟から、
幾人もの人が消えている。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000440_MINFILIA<tab>At a glance, one would assume the involvement of bandits, kidnappers, and coincidence.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000440_MINFILIA<tab>クリスタル強奪事件と、誘拐事件ってところね。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000450_MINFILIA<tab>Such crimes are hardly uncommon, and the Immortal Flames deal with their like almost every day.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000450_MINFILIA本来、こういった事件は、治安維持も務める
グランドカンパニーの仕事だわ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000460_MINFILIA<tab>However, this time we have reason to believe that a primal is involved.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000460_MINFILIAでも、この事件……。
おそらく蛮神が絡んでいる。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000470_THANCRED<tab>Aye, the evidence left behind implicates the Amalj'aa, who are known worshipers of Ifrit.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000470_THANCRED現場に残っていた手口。
おそらく、首謀者はウルダハに棲むアマルジャ族だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000480_THANCRED<tab>If we then consider the objects that were taken, there is no room left for doubt─the crimes were committed in the name of a primal.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000480_THANCREDアマルジャ族には、クリスタルを強奪したり、
人を誘拐する理由がある。
それこそが蛮神関連ってわけだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000490_MINFILIA<tab>That you may better understand the nature of our struggle with the primals, I would have you play the leading role in this investigation.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000490_MINFILIAあなたに「蛮神問題」を理解してもらうためにも、
この事件に関わってほしいの。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000500_MINFILIA<tab>You have my thanks.
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000510_MINFILIA<tab>If there is aught you wish to know, I recommend you speak with Thancred. He is well versed in the affairs of Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000510_MINFILIAウルダハの事情には、担当でもある、
サンクレッドが詳しいわ。
彼にあなたを支援してもらいます。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000520_THANCRED<tab>Ever at your service, <var 08 E905 ((fair lady)) ((dear fellow)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_000520_THANCRED俺に任せてくれ！
よろしくな！

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_10<tab>Ready to begin, are we? That's the spirit!
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_10よし、さっそく事件の調査に入ろう。
よろしくな、)) (( )) 03 /var>！

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_11<tab>So then, your mission is to investigate a crystal robbery and a spate of abductions.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_11今回の「クリスタル強奪事件」と「誘拐事件」……
この2つは、必ず関係している。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_12<tab>...Crimes which we believe to be connected. Assuming we are correct, it is like that any discoveries we make in relation to one will further our understanding of the other.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_12片方の事件を調べていけば、
もう一方の事件の真相も、おのずと明らかになるはず。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_13<tab>Now, since the attack on their caravan, our friends at Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern have doubled security over all their shipments.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_13クリスタル強奪事件については、
アマジナ鉱山社が、護衛を増やして対処するそうだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_14<tab>In light of this, it is my judgment that the abductions should be our priority.
target: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_14<tab>だから俺たちは、貧民の誘拐事件を追おう。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_15<tab>According to our preliminary findings, the majority of the missing were last seen in the vicinity of Camp Drybone, so that would seem a fine place to begin.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_15今のところ解っているのは、
東ザナラーンの「キャンプ・ドライボーン」近辺で
特に行方不明者が多いってことだけだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_16<tab>A fellow by the name of Isembard serves as the camp's de facto leader. Pay him a visit, and see that he gives us his full cooperation.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_THANCRED_000_16となれば、現地で情報収集しかないだろ？
キャンプ・ドライボーンの顔役「イセムバード」から
話を聞いてみるとしようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_20<tab>Aye, I'm Isembard. Here to search for the missing folk, I take it?
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_20ああ、私がイセムバードだ。
君は……誘拐事件を追っている冒険者だな？

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_21<tab>Minfilia sent word that an adventurer fitting your description would be along.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_21ミンフィリア君から話は聞いている。
彼女とは、ちょっとした付き合いがあってね。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_22<tab>She also warned us to be wary of the Amalj'aa. It seems we know who the culprits are, at the very least.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_22アマルジャ族に警戒しろ、とも言われているよ。
なんでも、誘拐事件の犯人だそうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_23<tab>Now, I bear no official title at this camp, but the people here have come to look to me for leadership. You have my word that I'll do all I can to help see the victims safely returned.
target:
TEXT_MANFST207_00510_ISEMBARD_000_23私もドライボーンの顔役として、
事件解決への協力は惜しまないつもりだ。
調査に入るときには、声をかけてくれ。
